Title: The Land Before Time VI: The Secret of Saurus Rock
Writer: Libby Hinson (screenplay), John Loy (screenplay), Judy Freudberg (characters), Tony Geiss (characters)
Actors: Thomas Dekker, Kenneth Mars, Anndi McAfee, Aria Noelle Curzon
Plot: Grandpa tells Littlefoot about their mythical hero called the Lone Dinosaur. Sarah gets two little lively cousins to take care of. Later, the kids accidentally chip the lucky Saurus Rock, and need to fix it before the bad luck hits.
